thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Gael Bourgeois

author: Gael Bourgeois
title: Gael Bourgeois
text:
I received from Mike Dods, a level of service that I can rarely say I get. My expectations are always high (too high for many people). Mike EXCEEDED these expectations. I would recommend Flashbay anytime and wish people I refer are taken in charge by Mike Dods.
Trust me - I see the glass half empty very often... if I take the time to write this message, it's because for a rare occasion, the glass was half full.
Regards,
